channel.title: Garbage and Recycling Friday Route ABE

image.title: Garbage and Recycling Friday Route ABE

item.title: Garbage Day 6/4/22 6:00 AM
item.description: Collection is delayed one day due to the Memorial Day holiday. Place securely bagged garbage inside your garbage cart.
item.comments: Place your garbage cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m.

item.title: Organics Calendar (Friday) 6/4/22 6:00 AM
item.description: Collection will be delayed one day due to the Memorial Day holiday. Organics must be bagged in certified compostable plastic bags, paper bags, or securely wrapped in newspaper. Place bagged or wrapped organics inside your organics recycling cart. Paper egg cartons and pizza boxes from delivery do not need to be bagged.
item.comments: Place your organics recycling cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m., next to your garbage cart.

item.title: Garbage Day 6/10/22 6:00 AM
item.description: Place securely bagged garbage inside your garbage cart.
item.comments: Place your garbage cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m.

item.title: Organics Calendar (Friday) 6/10/22 6:00 AM
item.description: Organics must be bagged in certified compostable plastic bags, paper bags, or securely wrapped in newspaper. Place bagged or wrapped organics inside your organics recycling cart. Paper egg cartons and pizza boxes from delivery do not need to be bagged.
item.comments: Place your organics recycling cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m., next to your garbage cart.

item.title: Recycling Day 6/10/22 6:00 AM
item.description: Recycling should be placed loose inside your recycling cart. Please empty recycling from bags, and flatten all boxes.
item.comments: Place your blue one-sort recycling cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m.

item.description: Place securely bagged garbage inside your garbage cart.
item.comments: Place your garbage cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m.

item.title: Garbage Day 6/24/22 6:00 AM
item.description: Collection is not affected by the Juneteenth holiday. Place securely bagged garbage inside your garbage cart.
item.comments: Place your garbage cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m.

item.comments: Place your organics recycling cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m., next to your garbage cart.

item.comments: Place your blue one-sort recycling cart at the alley or curb line by 6 a.m.
